name: hackerbox
description: A web application to find articles from a selection of journalistic sources.

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client && npm run dev" "cd server && npm run server"
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.clearmodules: rm -rf node_modules && cd client && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../server && rm -rf node_modules
